post.author: ajm113
post.body:
I made a quick tutorial on Concrete Creation that can be applied to create textures for your maps or for a other game.

View Tutorial

post.author: g0th
post.body: It would help if you could use the program in full screen. I couldn't make out a single text inside the program and it's really hard to see what you did without it. Also perhaps a better look of the final result?

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
Download the newest window's media player right click on the video and go to full screen.

The final results are at the end of the video in gimp.
